name: Quantum Machinery

quote.text: Men in their arrogance claim to understand the nature of creation, and devise elaborate theories to describe its behavior. But always they discover in the end that God was quite a bit more clever than they thought.

description: The discovery of Quantum Power (D11) ushers in a new industrial revolution. In factories across Planet, tiny Quantum Machinery built using Nanometallurgy (E8) techniques provide amazingly powerful and efficient labor for every imaginable type of production and service.
